house_listing.house_description: Lovely brick home in quiet sought after neighborhood. Large lot,deck and privacy fence. New roof,walk-up attic,pergo floored foyer,large kitchen,end-load garage,large backyard, good storage.Shows great! Walk to school and park. Convenient location.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Colonial Style,Fenced, Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Utility Room, Walk-InCloset(s)
